Public Remarks: Fantastic craftsman style home in Whitby Estates with 180 degree sweeping ocean & city views. This 5 bedrooms & 6 bathrooms home is crafted with limestone floors, AC system, formal grand living room with high ceiling, gourmet kitchen all opening out to huge covered deck. 3 ensuited bedrooms upstairs,walk out lower floor has 2 bdrms open out to covered terrace with fire pit. Outdoor pool & Park-like garden overlooking million dollar views. Truly a show piece.

Public Remarks: Spectacular south-facing home with unobstructed panoramic VIEW from Mt Baker, downtown, UBC and far beyond. Situated on almost highest lot of Constantine Pl. Beautifully landscaped with amazing kinds of seasonal flowers. This excellent 5 bdrm + office, 5 bath, 5150 sq ft home offers formal living/dining rm, spacious family rm and gourmet kitchen with granite counters, top of line appliances & potential wok kitchen space. Upstairs offers 4 bdrms with luxurious master suite featuring a huge walk-in closet. Walk-out lower level with 1 bdrm and recrm. A must see.

Public Remarks: PANORAMIC VIEW to city, ocean and lion's gate bridge. Rarely find large land in Golden mile with solid custom built 7 bdrm & 7 baths house in prestigious British Properties. The indoor swimming pool walk out to the park liked beautiful landscaped garden with fish ponds, tennis court, great rec room so much entertainments for family & friends to enjoy. Easy driveway with triple car garages. Convenient location, close to Chartwell, Sentinel & Collingwood schools. Hollyburn Country Club, Capilano golf Course. Dont miss this opportunity to live, hold or build a new home on the fabulous 27,985 sqft private estate.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate, buyer to verify. Lot size from Tax report. Owner has spend 250K in upgrading roof, interior * exterior paints, energy save furnace and part of new floor.

Public Remarks: Charming character home sits on a 185.73 x 169/139 (22,291 sqft) over 1/2 acre lot in UBC with potential mountain and water views. This close to 2800 sqft 3 level split home features functional floor plan, hardwood floors throughout on main, gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances. 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms upstairs. Below with a huge recreation room and 1 bedroom. Large patio at the back, great for entertaining guests and a park like setting yard with playground area. 2 cars garage. Close to Chan Centre, U Hill Elementary and Secondary schools.
Realtor Remarks: NO TOUCHBASE or TEXT after 5:30pm. All meas are approx. Buyer to verify if important.

Public Remarks: Prime Shaughnessy location. Big 90'x180' (16200 s.f.) lot. Surround by trees and fence and feel like in the Garden of Eden. House was designed by Daniel Evan White, an accomplished Vancouver-based architect. House is well maintained. Good holding property or build your Dream Home!
Realtor Remarks: Mostly land value. Still livable and can be good holding. Sales by trustee. Easy to show but require advance notice.

Public Remarks: A Very Rare Opportunity in Vancouver's most exclusive seaside location! There are few homes that offer the location, views and privacy provided by this home. Homes in this block are rarely available for sale to the public. This beautiful property is perched above the street for maximum privacy and the best ocean/City views but provides easy walk down access to the long stretch of sandy beach in front of it. Enjoy all day sun with the eastern sunrises over the City to the western sunsets off Spanish Banks. The current home was designed for a professional couple and is well laid out to take advantage of the views and light. If you have been looking for a rare property with an exclusive location, this home is unsurpassed!
Realtor Remarks: All meas & lot sizes are approx, buyer to verify. DO NOT walk the property. Access is from NW Marine Dr, call for instructions. Ppty is across the beach with unobstructed views. In archaeological preserved area. Viewings WEEKDAY between 12-5pm preferred. 24-48hr notice req'd.

Public Remarks: Absolutely sensational Upper Dundarave estate. Custom built for the owners by Georgia award winning builder G.D. Nielsen Construction. Situated on almost 24,000 sq. ft. of land with absolutely stunning city, ocean and sunset views! Total privacy, gorgeous outdoor areas including a sundrenched pool and spa, outdoor dining and BBQ area with an amazing fire pit. The interior is designed with the utmost in quality and taste. Wonderful family plan with 4 generous size bedrooms up, all with ensuite bathrooms, including a 'to die for' master suite. The main floor is open and spacious with the nicest office I have seen yet. Downstairs features a games room, recreation room, wine cellar, theatre and steam room. Too many features to list!
Realtor Remarks: NO SIGN ON PROPERTY; FLOOR PLAN BY MEASURE MASTERS TO FOLLOW http://www.brocksmeaton.com/showlisting/60384/2451-Palmerston-Avenue-Dundarave-West-Vancouver/

Public Remarks: This is West Vancouver's finest estate property. An astonishing 13,271 sq. ft. new home constructed over a period of 3 years by master builder, Linda Burger. The almost acre property is masterfully landscaped with mature plantings throughout. Private gates open to a large auto court with covered parking for 7 vehicles. The main floor offers a spacious 4,248 sq. ft. of living space with cross hall living and dining rooms with soaring cathedral ceilings. The layout and flow is spectacular from the high quality kitchen to the eclipse doors opening to a large covered patio, swimming pool, hot tub, barbeque area and gardens. A total of 7 bedrooms and 11 bathrooms ensure luxury accomodations for all.
Realtor Remarks: To show text Sam at 604-802-5283 (Mon-Fri 9-5) or Eric at 604-312-9999 (Eve. & Wknd.s). For f/plan, video and photos go to www.ericchristiansen.com. 819 sq. ft. is coach house over garage. Below bdrm is in coach house. http://www.vopenhouse.ca/vid/12757_f4fc2a/
